description: The Freeride Long Socks for men feature a range of technical details so you can spend longer freeriding in powder. Fine merino wool feels comfortably soft on the skin and also has a temperature and moisture regulating effect. Extra flat toe seams prevent chafing and blisters despite intense movement. The comfort cuff and ergonomically shaped left and right shaping ensure an optimal fit and prevent slipping, while padding in the heel and toe areas provides cushioning and makes the long socks more durable. The extra soft teddy fleece material around the footbed provides comfort and brings the feet up to a pleasant temperature – even out in icy couloirs. The long socks’ slight compression effect prevents your feet becoming prematurely fatigued and ensures long-lasting freeriding fun.
name: Ortovox Freeride Long Socks Cozy - Mens
